main.div:
EMEA College of Arts and Science, Kondotti is fast emerging as a resourceful destination for higher studies in Malabar, spreading the fragrance of education in the society. This college is affiliated to the University of Calicut. The college offers up-to-date, advanced, and job-oriented programmes in the vast expanding horizon of humanities, commerece, and science and technology.
The college is situated at Kumminiparamba in Kondotti, 6 KMs away from University of Calicut, 2 KMs from Calicut International Airport, 18 KMs from Feroke Railway Station, and 32 KMs from Calicut City; with a congenial atmosphere for academic pursuits. The place is ideally suited for the growth and development of educational institutions for higher learning. The institution aims at the over all development of this backward area of Kerala by opening new vistas of opportunities to the future generations, without any discrimination against caste, creed, sex or colour.
The college is run by Ernad Muslim Educational Association, which was formed with the objective of establishing a chain of educational institutions and cultural centres to cater to the needs of educationally and culturally backward section of the community. The college is a stepping stone to realize the objectives envisaged by the Association.
Established on 1st November 1982 as a junior college, it flourished as a post graduate college today.

EMEA College of Arts and Science, Kondottti, was established as an embodiment of a long cherished dream of people of Ernad, a backward region in erstwhile Malabar District of British India. With the illustrious aim of bringing the educationally deprived youth of the region into the mainstream of education, the college came into existence in 1982 thanks to the efforts of visionary social leaders like Sayyid Mohammed Ali Shihab Thangal, Jb. P Seethi Haji Sahib, Jb. Avukader Kutty Naha Sahib, Jb. N.V Ibrahim Master, etc. The college is run by Ernad Muslim Education Association, a registered society formed by a group of social reformers for establishing educational institutions to uplift the socially and economically backward populace of the region.
Started in 1982 as a humble institution offering pre-degree courses in commerce and humanities, the college is now a full-fledged centre of academic excellence providing five PG Programmes, eleven UG Programmes two BVoc Programmes and a PhD Programme in Economics. The college was accredited by NAAC with 'B++' grade in its first cycle of accreditation in 2005. Later in 2014, it was awarded with 'A' grade. And recently in 2021, the college underwent the third cycle and got accredited with 'A' grade (CGPA: 3.13)
EMEA College is now renowned for its excellence in academic performance, well-qualified faculty, state-of-the-art facilities, and curricular and co-curricular activities. The beautiful campus sprawls over twenty acres of land. That the college has all facilities and provisions for enhancing the abilities of student community like SMST Memorial Central Library, science and computer science laboratories, Wi-Fi connectivity, research and publication facilities, audio visual theatre, auditorium, sports ground, gymnasium, hostels; NSS, SIP, NCC Units, Students Union, and the presence of other club activities make the college an ideal campus that every student dreams of.
The support and guidance being extended by the philanthropic EMEA management to the college and students are distinctive. Old Students Association of EMEA (OSAEMEA), the alumni association is committed to the betterment of their alma mater and contributes immensely to its infrastructural and academic growth. The activities and contributions of the college PTA are unparalleled. The Shihab Thangal Memorial Merit Scholarship it instituted is the best example.
The college has always promoted the sports and arts activities of the students. The Physical Education Department has won myriad of state and national level championships in football, weightlifting, Wushu, and volleyball.
Being a temple of learning, the college is committed to provide quality education, and to help students chase and achieve their aspirations along with fostering good nature, discipline, respect and responsibility within them and thereby moulding them into useful individuals for their family and society.
Let us do the best.
Thank you.
Lt. Abdul Rasheed P
Principal
Contact Info: Email: principal@emeacollege.ac.in Phone : 0483 271 3530, 9400600786

div.h2: EMEA College of Arts and Science
div.p: Kumminiparamaba PO
Kondotty, Malappuram Dt.
Kerala - India
